desc: PhonoLab is a vinyl record cutting studio. We put your music on record with no minimum order quantities. Whether you need a small run for a release, a one-off dub plate for DJing or a mixtape style personalised record for a special gift, we can help! COme and browse our shop or get in touch today to find out more.

layout.text: PhonoLab is a vinyl record cutting studio. We put your music on record with no minimum order. Whether you need a small run for a release, a one-off for DJing or simply a special gift, we can help.
